update mip_open_collection_info set gs_No = #{gsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_unit = #{collectionUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_level = #{collectionLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_type = #{yearType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collections_category = #{collectionsCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_audio = #{fAudio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_video = #{fVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, three_dimensional_collection = #{threeDimensionalCollection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_ids = #{pictureIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click_counts = #{clickCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collected_counts = #{collectedCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_high_quality = #{isHighQuality,jdbcType=TINYINT}, collection_type = #{collectionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from mip_collection_category c order by c.sequence desc

select b.id,b.name,b.collection_unit as collectionUnit,b.description,
(case when g.id is null or g.id = '' then 0 else 1 end) as iscollection,
b.year_type as yearType,b.collection_level as collectionLevel, c.name as categoryName, b.click_counts as clickCounts,b.collected_counts as collectedCounts, (select f_audio from mip_open_culturalrelic_info where id = b.id) as fAudio,b.f_video as fVideo,b.picture_ids as pictureIds, d.name as museumName, f.name as yearName from mip_open_collection_info b inner join mip_collection_category c on(b.collections_category = c.id) inner join mip_organization d on(b.collection_unit = d.id) left join mip_year_type f on(f.id = b.year_type)
left join mip_collect g on(g.type=1 and g.uid=#{userid} and g.cid=b.id and g.`status` = '1')
where 1=1 and b.id = #{id}

select b.id,b.name,b.collection_unit as collectionUnit,b.description, b.collection_level as collectionLevel, c.name as categoryName, b.click_counts as clickCounts,b.collected_counts as collectedCounts, (select f_audio from mip_open_culturalrelic_info where id = b.id) as fAudio,b.f_video as fVideo,b.picture_ids as pictureIds, d.name as museumName, f.name as yearName from mip_open_collection_info b inner join mip_collection_category c on(b.collections_category = c.id) inner join mip_organization d on(b.collection_unit = d.id) left join mip_year_type f on(f.id = b.year_type) where 1=1 and b.collection_unit = #{orgId} and b.id not in(#{currentId}) limit #{size}
